oai_dc:dc.dc:title: N-Alkylation of diethyl acetamidomalonate: synthesis of constrained amino acid derivatives by ring-closing metathesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, SAMBASIVARAO
SINGH, KULDEEP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: chromatography
derivatives
amino acids
synthesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An efficient method for N-alkylation of diethyl acetamidomalonate (DEAM) is reported. C-Alkenylation was achieved by treating the N-alkenylated DEAM with various electrophiles in the presence of Cs2CO3. RCM reactions of C- and N-alkenylated products gave cyclic amino acid derivatives in good yields.
